Package om.helper

Helper utility classes for question authors.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AnswerChecking Static utility routines designed to help in checking user answers.
AnswerChecking.Result Generic result class that most methods return.
AnswerChecking.SciNotationResult Result of scientific notation check
BlankQuestion Question class you can use while developing question xml if you don't have an actual class for it yet.
Match The Match class is used to test if a string satisfies a set word pattern matching rules.
NullQuestion This may be useful for testing question.xml files, without writing a class.
SimpleQuestion1 Base class for simple questions that have an input box and an answer box (simultaneously visible) and match certain other 'standard' requirements in their XML.
 

Package om.helper Description

Helper utility classes for question authors.

Covered in document: Om question authoring.doc
